a7k9m3x2q1.title: The Shawshank Redemption
a7k9m3x2q1.synopsis: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

a7k9m3x2q1.title: The Godfather
a7k9m3x2q1.synopsis: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

a7k9m3x2q1.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
a7k9m3x2q1.synopsis: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

a7k9m3x2q1.title: 12 Angry Men
a7k9m3x2q1.synopsis: A jury holdout attempts to prevent a miscarriage of justice by forcing his colleagues to reconsider the evidence.

a7k9m3x2q1.title: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
a7k9m3x2q1.synopsis: A criminal pleads insanity and is admitted to a mental institution, where he rebels against the oppressive nurse and rallies up the scared patients.

b8n4p6y5r3.title: Pulp Fiction
b8n4p6y5r3.synopsis: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

b8n4p6y5r3.title: The Dark Knight
b8n4p6y5r3.synopsis: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

b8n4p6y5r3.title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
b8n4p6y5r3.synopsis: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station.

b8n4p6y5r3.title: Casablanca
b8n4p6y5r3.synopsis: A cynical expatriate American cafe owner struggles to decide whether or not to help his former lover and her fugitive husband escape the Nazis in French Morocco.

b8n4p6y5r3.title: Citizen Kane
b8n4p6y5r3.synopsis: Following the death of publishing tycoon Charles Foster Kane, reporters scramble to uncover the meaning of his final utterance: 'Rosebud'.

c9z7w1e4t6.title: Forrest Gump
c9z7w1e4t6.synopsis: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.

c9z7w1e4t6.title: Inception
c9z7w1e4t6.synopsis: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

c9z7w1e4t6.title: Titanic
c9z7w1e4t6.synopsis: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

c9z7w1e4t6.title: The Silence of the Lambs
c9z7w1e4t6.synopsis: A young FBI cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

c9z7w1e4t6.title: Saving Private Ryan
c9z7w1e4t6.synopsis: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

d5h8j2k9l0.title: The Matrix
d5h8j2k9l0.synopsis: A computer programmer is led to fight an underground war against powerful computers who have constructed his entire reality with a system called the Matrix.

d5h8j2k9l0.title: Goodfellas
d5h8j2k9l0.synopsis: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito.

d5h8j2k9l0.title: Apocalypse Now
d5h8j2k9l0.synopsis: A U.S. Army officer serving in Vietnam is tasked with assassinating a colonel who has set himself up as a god among a local tribe.

d5h8j2k9l0.title: Taxi Driver
d5h8j2k9l0.synopsis: A mentally unstable veteran works as a nighttime taxi driver in New York City, where the perceived decadence and sleaze fuels his urge for violent action.

d5h8j2k9l0.title: Vertigo
d5h8j2k9l0.synopsis: A former police detective juggles wrestling with his personal demons and becoming obsessed with a beautiful woman while investigating a psychological mystery.

f3v6s9n2m7.title: Schindler's List
f3v6s9n2m7.synopsis: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

f3v6s9n2m7.title: Fight Club
f3v6s9n2m7.synopsis: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into an anarchist organization.

f3v6s9n2m7.title: Psycho
f3v6s9n2m7.synopsis: A Phoenix secretary embezzles $40,000 from her employer's client, goes on the run and checks into a remote motel run by a young man under the domination of his mother.

f3v6s9n2m7.title: Rear Window
f3v6s9n2m7.synopsis: A photographer in a wheelchair spies on his neighbors from his apartment window and becomes convinced one of them has committed murder.

f3v6s9n2m7.title: The Departed
f3v6s9n2m7.synopsis: An undercover cop and a police informant play a cat and mouse game with each other as they attempt to infiltrate an Irish gang in South Boston.
